Properties.ProtectedString:
local Handle = script.Parent
function createUKExplosion(startPos) local throwersLocation = Vector3.new() if Handle:FindFirstChild('vCharacterLoc') then throwersLocation = Handle.vCharacterLoc.Value end -- Create a rotation matrix such that the explosion is oriented towards the player -- multiply rotation matrix * position so that the letters position will be rotated local rotationCFrame = CFrame.new(startPos, startPos + (startPos - throwersLocation)) -- vTorso.CFrame.p)) -- this is the distance between explosions, think of it as if explosions were pixels in a pixelated font local pixelSize = 24 -- The distance from the start of U to the start of K local kOffset = pixelSize * 8 -- Create the U for i = 1, 5 do -- left side of U local explosion = Instance.new('Explosion', Workspace) explosion.Position = rotationCFrame * (Vector3.new(0,-1 * pixelSize * i, 0))-- + startPos) explosion.BlastPressure = 0 -- right side of U local explosion2 = Instance.new('Explosion', Workspace) explosion2.Position = rotationCFrame * (Vector3.new(pixelSize * 4, -1 * pixelSize * i, 0))-- + startPos) explosion2.BlastPressure = 0 end --Bottom of U local explosionBottomLeft = Instance.new('Explosion', Workspace) explosionBottomLeft.Position = rotationCFrame * (Vector3.new(pixelSize * 1, -1 * pixelSize * 6, 0))-- + startPos) explosionBottomLeft.BlastPressure = 0
--Bottom of U local explosionBottomLeft = Instance.new('Explosion', Workspace) explosionBottomLeft.Position = rotationCFrame * (Vector3.new(pixelSize * 3, -1 * pixelSize * 6, 0))-- + startPos) explosionBottomLeft.BlastPressure = 0
-- Bottom middle of U local explosionBottomLeft = Instance.new('Explosion', Workspace) explosionBottomLeft.Position = rotationCFrame * (Vector3.new(pixelSize * 2, -1 * pixelSize * 6, 0))-- + startPos) explosionBottomLeft.BlastPressure = 0
-- Verticle part of K for i = 0, 7 do local explosion = Instance.new('Explosion', Workspace) explosion.Position = rotationCFrame * (Vector3.new(kOffset,-1 * pixelSize * i, 0))-- + startPos) explosion.BlastPressure = 0 end local middleOfK = (-3 * pixelSize) -- Top angled part of K for i = 2, 4 do local explosion = Instance.new('Explosion', Workspace) explosion.Position = rotationCFrame * (Vector3.new(kOffset + pixelSize * i, middleOfK + pixelSize * i, 0))-- + startPos) explosion.BlastPressure = 0 end
-- Bottom angled part of K for i = 2, 4 do local explosion = Instance.new('Explosion', Workspace) explosion.Position = rotationCFrame * (Vector3.new(kOffset + pixelSize * i, middleOfK - pixelSize * i, 0))-- + startPos) explosion.BlastPressure = 0 end
end
wait(5)
Handle.Transparency = 1.0
createUKExplosion(Handle.CFrame.p + Vector3.new(75, 80, 0)) --Vector3.new(0, 200, 0)) wait(0.5) createUKExplosion(Handle.CFrame.p + Vector3.new(75, 80, 0)) --Vector3.new(0, 200, 0))

-- For the purpose of animations
local Tool = script.Parent local Handle = Tool.Handle
local vCharacter local vPlayer local vTorso local vHumanoid
local DiscusThrow
local RBX_Debris = game:GetService('Debris')
local speedUp = 1
local equipped = false
local vMouse
function onEquipped(mouse) if equipped then return end equipped = true vCharacter = Tool.Parent vPlayer = game.Players:GetPlayerFromCharacter(vCharacter) vHumanoid = vCharacter:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") vTorso = vCharacter:FindFirstChild("Torso") vMouse = mouse
if not DiscusThrow then DiscusThrow = vHumanoid:LoadAnimation(Tool.DiscusThrow) end end
function onUnequipped() equipped = false
end
local lastActivatedTime = tick()
function onActivate() if tick() - lastActivatedTime > 2.6 / speedUp then lastActivatedTime = tick() local spin = Instance.new('BodyAngularVelocity', vTorso) RBX_Debris:AddItem(spin, 1.6) spin.angularvelocity = Vector3.new(0, 2.3, 0) * math.rad(360) spin.P = 1000 spin.maxTorque = Vector3.new(100000000, 100000000, 100000000) wait(0.2)
if DiscusThrow then DiscusThrow:Play() end wait(0.6) spawnDiscus()
end
end
function spawnDiscus() local discusCopy = Handle:Clone() Handle.Transparency = 1.0 RBX_Debris:AddItem(discusCopy, 8) discusCopy.Parent = Workspace if discusCopy:FindFirstChild('vCharacterLoc') and vTorso then discusCopy.vCharacterLoc.Value = vTorso.CFrame.p end if discusCopy:FindFirstChild('ExplosionScript') then discusCopy.ExplosionScript.Disabled = false end local bodyVel = Instance.new("BodyVelocity", discusCopy) bodyVel.maxForce = Vector3.new(4000000, 400000, 400000) if vTorso then bodyVel.velocity = (vTorso.CFrame.lookVector + Vector3.new(0, 0.5, 0)) * 50 else print( 'No Torso Found' ) end wait(2.1) Handle.Transparency = 0.0
end
Tool.Equipped:connect(onEquipped) Tool.Unequipped:connect(onUnequipped) Tool.Activated:connect(onActivate)
